title: Bath and Body Works Sweet Cinnamon Pumpkin Ultra Shea Body Cream 8 Ounce Chalkboard Label Fall 2020
description: Your favorite fall fragrance is back in season! Infused with luxuriously rich shea butter, our Ultra Shea Body Cream is clinically tested to provide 24 hours of nourishing moisture. With soothing aloe, pampering cocoa butter, nourishing coconut oil and more shea than ever before, our non-greasy formula melts into skin to provide all day, all night hydration.
